tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Metro)) (VP (VBP are) (VP (VBG using) (NP (DT the) (NN phrase) (`` `) (NP (JJ financial) (NN Armageddon)) ('' ')) (NP-TMP (DT this) (NN morning)))) (. .)))
